Reviews.Title: Very delicate phone!!
Reviews.Author: Joanie "Joanie"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone from AT&T; in November.  The front scratched very easily and when I went to use the camera the picture was really bad.  Discovered the lens was shattered, the phone had never been dropped. Because the 30 day warranty had been expired a few days they refused to repair or replace the phone.  I would not recommend this phone to anyone.  I have a Motorola flip phone for about 4 years, dropped it many times and it still works perfectly, camera and all.  I plan on going back to the Motorola and returning this to AT&T.;

Reviews.Title: Its a shame
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone to my friend , phone is excelent but... if you want to change the language to spanish is imposible it s a shame.
